trait.name: Chakra
entries: Roshi has 45 chakra points which he can expend. All chakra points are regained at the end of a long rest.

trait.name: Endurance
entries: When Roshi is targeted by an effect that allows him to make a Constitution saving throw to take half damage on a success, he takes no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

trait.name: Jinchuriki Regeneration
entries: At the beginning of each of his turns, Roshi regains 8 hit points

trait.name: Jinchuriki Resistance
entries: Roshi has advantage on Dexterity and Constitution saving throws.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@dice 3d6 + 4}) magical bludgeoning damage. On a miss, Roshi still deals half damage.

action.name: Lava Style
entries: Scorching Rock (17 Chakra). Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 1}) fire damage + 8 ({@damage 2d4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tailed Beast Bomb (20 Chakra)
entries: All creatures in a 10 ft. by 60 ft. line or 20 ft. radius 60 ft. from Roshi must succeed a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they take 60 ({@damage 10d10 + 1}) force damage, are pushed to the closest edge of the area, and fall {@condition prone}. On a success, they take half as much damage. This jutsu ignores evasion.

reaction.name: Return Strike
entries: When a creature fails to hit Roshi with a melee attack, he may make an unarmed strike.
